item.description:
4/7/09

I do have the five tickets for the four coming with me and myself.

2/17/09 Update

There will be no tickets sold at the door on Saturday.
April 3rd will be the last day to purchase advanced tickets.

March 26 will be the last day to RSVP for this Meet Up.
March 27th I will be mailing for tickets.

Spring 09 Chiller Theater Expo

www.chillertheatre.com/main.htm

http://www.chillerthe...

Look at the link for the event details;

Driving to
Chiller Theatre Toy, Model and Film Extravaganza
Hilton Hotel
Parsippany, New Jersey, 07054

Directions can be found on the link.

I do go a different way;
From West Haven I 95 to Exit 38 veer left towards
The Merritt Parkway that later becomes the
Hutchinson River Parkway to Exit 26 West on to
I 287 West and I 87. Take exit 15 to get off I 87
To stay on I 287.
(FYI Exit 55 has a Wendy's or Burger King if you need a break.
The Burger King is closer to the High Way Ramp.
There is also a Stop & Shop Off this Exit.)
Exit 39B to Rte 10 W towards Dover.
Exit on to Dryden Way.
Left on Campus Drive.
Left on Hilton Ct.
Pay attention to turns.
I have missed a turn and had to go back.
You can Park in the Building Complex on the Left.
Short Walk to the Hilton Hotel beyond the Pond on the
Right.

To answer the question of what is Chiller Con.
Chiiller Con has a few things happening at once, various vendors are selling
their products such as DVDs or Model Figurines or Magazines or Autographed Photos, etc.
Newer Genre or B Movie Stars are there to promote their most recent genre movies.
Older stars come out of their retirement to meet their fans.
Wrestlers and other kinds of entertainers also come out to meet their fans.

The October Show has the fans dressed up in all kinds of costumes, esp.
but not limited to Goth clothes. Below is the link to the Trip Report from
last years October Show.

http://conspiracy.mee...

conspiracy.meetup.com/83/messages/boards/thread/5696853

It is encouraged that you purchase tickets beforehand a few weeks
Before the Spring Con.

I will send reminder memos from time to time before the Con.

It is usually lots of fun.

Remember to bring your cameras.
A listing of stars / guests will also come in handy.
There might be long lines to get some autographs.

http://www.chillerthe...

www.chillertheatre.com/gt/gtc4.htm

Realize that more Guests will be added closer to the date.
Some of the below might have been in more than one
Different horror/genre film.

Examples of Guests...
Micky Dolenz...Monkees & Halloween
From different Star Treks series there will be 5 guests.
From the different, esp. Original, Night of the Living Dead Series there will be
10 guests.
Flash TV Series there will be 2 guests.
From the different Halloween series there will be 5 guests.
From the different Friday the 13th series there will be 3 guests.
So far Rachel Grant from Die Another Day is the only Bond girl.
Peter Graves from Mission Impossible.
Tracy Scoggins from Bablyon 5, Crusade and many movies.

Please keep an eye on the Guest Link to see who else attends.

The Expo is all weekend from Friday April 17 to
Sunday April 19.

If more than one vehicle is going, then the passengers should
Share phone numbers in case the different vehicles have
To contact each other.

Mike B
Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: Members who are coming need to contact me regarding car pooling.
item.name: CT attends Spring 09 Chiller Theater Expo - Saturday @ 4/18
